mapper.select: SELECT i.id as item_id, i.price as item_price, i.stock as item_stock, p.id as product_id, p.slug as product_slug, p.name as product_name, p.description as product_description FROM item i JOIN product p on p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.id = #{itemId}
